entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is the headmaster of Durmstrang Institute. He is described as turning and leading his students towards the doors.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as stopping to let Karkaroff walk through first.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned alongside Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned alongside Harry and Ron.

entities.name: durmstrang students
entities.description: The Durmstrang students are described as coming to a halt behind Karkaroff.

relationships.description: Karkaroff stared at Harry as though he couldn't believe his eyes. His eyes fixed upon Harry's scar.
